name: The Legend Of Zelda: Mercury's Sleep (Fangame)
name_original: The Legend Of Zelda: Mercury's Sleep (Fangame)
description:
This game is a Fangame not related to Nintendo!

A messenger has came to tell link of a possible quest he could complete.

A town has been under attack from a dragon from a local cave, find the dragon and kill it...

Find the dragon, and defeat it.

Releases 6:00 GBT 20th of april 2020.
